name: a geography of being
description:
"a geography of being" is a 2D platformer-style game that places the player in the role of an undocumented youth that must face several challenges in the search for self-determination beyond the imposed constraints of citizenry. Play the game and listen to a conversation between two young men, one from India the other from Ecuador who have grown up in the United States, but remain undocumented.

Use arrow keys to move, space bar to interact with objects, escape key to go layer menu, space bar to begin.
